Directives in tubular-reporting.directives

  • tbReporting - The `tbReporting` directive is the base to create reports using the .NET proxy service.
  • tbReportingToolbar - Use `tbReportingToolbar` directive to show a common toolbar to load/save reports and generate them. You can use your own UI if you prefer using the available methods in the parent controller.
  • tbReportingColumnsSelector - Use `tbReportingColumnsSelector` directive to display a table to allow the user to add and remove columns and generate a Report Model.
